property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever one of your fire creatures win a battle, you may draw a card. {DRAGSOLUTION}: At the start of your turn, if you have 2 or more fire creatures in the battle zone, flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it. {HYPERSPATIAL DRAGHEART} ■ Dragsolution: At the start of your turn, if you have 2 or more fire creatures in the battle zone, flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it. (At the start of your game, draghearts are put into your hyperspatial zone. If a creature equipped with it or the dragheart leaves the battle zone, return it there.)

property.name: Rules
Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a non-evolution light creature that costs 3 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ All creatures attack if able. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, put a fire dragheart that costs 4 or less or a dragheart that costs 2 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.) ■ While battling, this creature gets +3000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When this creature wins a battle, destroy it. ■ When this creature is destroyed, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ You may destroy one of your creatures. If you do, destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ One of your creatures in the battle zone gets +3000 power until the end of the turn. Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. Those 2 creatures battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a dragheart that costs 3 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.)

property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Draw up to 3 cards. Then put 2 cards from your hand on top of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {MANA ARMS} 3: When you put this creature, if you have 3 or more fire cards in your mana zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. If you do, this creature and that creature battle. ■ While battling, this creature gets +1000 power.
